title: Assessment of mineral content, techno-functional properties and colour of an extruded breakfast cereals using yellow maize, sorghum and date palm
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): A.B. Adepeju, D.M. Aluko, A.O. Olugbuyi, A.M. Oyinloye, O.O. Adeniran
